definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)

sentences.english: We have"Wangji Chicken Soup" and "Steamed Wuchang Fish".
sentences.chinese: 有汪集鸡汤和清蒸武昌鱼。

sentences.english: This wine goes very well with the steamed fish.
This is steamed chick. a specialty of this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 这是清蒸仔鸡，这家饭店的特色菜。

sentences.english: I had steamed fish, rice, boiled vegetables and some milk.
sentences.chinese: 我吃清蒸鱼，煮蔬菜和一些牛奶。

sentences.english: No. 7:Sorry to have kept you waiting . Here is your Steamed Mandarin Fish .
sentences.chinese: 抱歉让您久等了，这是您的清蒸桂鱼。

sentences.english: We make a very nice steamed fish.
Food like roasted suckling pig, steamed chicken, fruit and wine are offered during the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 食物一样，只烧乳猪，清蒸鸡，水果和酒者在。

sentences.english: Come with metal rack for baking and steaming .
sentences.chinese: 内附金属架，可烘烤或清蒸食物。

sentences.english: How about steamed codfish? It's quick and easy.
sentences.chinese: 那要不要吃清蒸鳕鱼？这道菜又快又简单。

sentences.english: Eat steamed vegetables, eat steamed fish or eat salads.
sentences.chinese: 吃蒸熟的蔬菜，吃清蒸鱼或吃沙拉。

sentences.english: It is often served simply as steamed or boiled cobs, or removed from the cob and lightly fried.
sentences.chinese: 它往往只是清蒸或水煮棒子，或从芯和轻炸。

sentences.english: Would you like steamed fish or steamed shrimps with garlic?No, none of them.
sentences.chinese: 你想食用清蒸鱼还是蒜茸蒸虾？

sentences.english: This is steamed bass, and this is fried scorpion.
sentences.chinese: 这是清蒸鲈鱼，这是油炸蝎子。

sentences.english: Sounds nice. What about vegetable dishes?Or some fish?
sentences.chinese: 清蒸鱼不错，再配上炝炒包心菜就很好了。

definition: to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
salad with dressing/cold vegetables dressed with sauce (e.g. coleslaw)
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
Sichuan poached sliced fish in hot chili oil
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
